scripts.postinstall: node -e "const knex = require('knex')(require('./knexfile.js')[process.env.NODE_ENV || 'production']); knex.migrate.latest().then(() => { console.log('Migrations completed successfully'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { if (err.message.includes('already exists')) { console.log('Tables already exist, skipping migration'); process.exit(0); } else { console.error('Migration failed:', err); process.exit(1); } });"
